tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr.Shwetha Guptha from my 3rd month of my pregnancy period, the day I met her she guided me so well & answered all my questions politely... I requested her for normal delivery she thought me whats the procedure how they do normal and in which conditions they go with c section.. I stil remember I asked one couple who is sitting in reception with a baby waiting for pediatrician consultion like where did they get delivery? Who is the doctor and ofcourse world wide question normal or c section 😂😂😂 they said we didn't had baby for 10 years and they were above 30 years ofcourse there was complications but due to Dr Shwetha we blessed with baby and it was a normal delivery we are happy and that happiness was seen on their face 🥰😊 which blew my mind & heart .. And yes even mine was a normal delivery ( for which each n every woman pray ) I was not having any complications but Dr Shwetha guided there staff whole night whereas I had labour for approx 22 hrs and when my cervix was open to 8 to 9 cm within few minutes Doctor was in front of me and she delivered & supported me so well till end . I am glad that I choosen Dr.shwetha for my first pregnancy and my pregnancy journey went amazing thanks to doctor and whole hospital crew who cared us so well even hospital food was amazing plus hospital maintained hygiene well due to current situation no need to get scared sparsh is safe for delivery🥰🥰🥰

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the most wonderful experience at Sparsh Hospital Yeshwantpur during the delivery of my first child Baby Boy, 

Dr.Shweta Gupta, my gynaecologist, deserves special recognition for her expertise, kindness, and professionalism. Though I had a Normal delivery but it was a very tough process by the end because of long 12hrs labour pain but Dr.Shwetha mam was very supportive and expertise and delivered my baby safely in most challenging situation that was very emotional moment for me.She waited till my cervix get open for delivery process. She is too friendly and have lot of patience and passion towards her work I feel.

I still remember as I wanted to change my hospital and doctor due to some reason in my 8th month so I Googled the review and tout to take consultation with Shwetha mam at sparsh hospital...Even I always wanted normal delivery as all women so I read all the stories written for Shwetha mam by every patient as how well she will be supportive and explain the process for normal delivery as well c sec. ******* *** ** *** **** ******** * **** ** **** ** ******* **** I cannot express enough appreciation for the exceptional care and support I received from the entire team at Sparsh . I took the best decision by choosing this Hospital and my doctor Shwetha mam, every staff member made me feel comfortable, safe, and well taken care of.

tags: None
review:
I went for my pregnancy checkup to dr Swetha when I first met her I was so sure about her that I decided to continue my pregnancy journey with her...she is very friendly ************* she will make you feel comfortable..i could ask her anything about my pregnancy one of the best doctor i have met so far 

Will highly recommend her for everyone who wants to continue their pregnancy journey with ease and friendly doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Shwetha Gupta amazing temperament to listens what the patient has to say and she provides guidance step by step to follow until you get back to normalcy...
Right from day 1 till delivery very neatly explained each and very circumstances and situations and how to deal with it was neatly communicated.
She is a gift to mankind and long-live doctor  and people need you.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shwetha Gupta ma'am is very friendly in nature,  and she will explain the health isssue in a very simple manner. She will advice in a good way..My first deliver was done by Dr. Shwetha mam only.. I am very happy that I got a best doctor. Sure I will refer Dr. Shwetha mam to my friends and relatives.😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is one of most wonderful Gynaceologist .My sister in law had premature leaking(26 weeks) of amniotic fluid.She was admitted to other hospital under different doctor that time and they were rigid in premature delivery.Then we contacted Dr Shweta,she was so cooperative and gave lot of strength to family.She was so patient all the time and was able to extend pregnancy by almost 4 weeks.Baby is healthy and doing perfectly fine now.All thanks to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is extremely patient and apt.....resolves the issues with proper treatment ....very friendly and explainative....I have no hinderence to ask any doubts regarding my issues with her.....she gives ample amount of time to speak ** **** ****** * **** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Doctor was very patience enough **** **** ********* * I had been referred to her by my brother for pregnancy checkup and baby birth . Based on my reports doc suggested me to wait for normal delivery which majority of docs does not prefer normal and suggest c section. However, after 7 hours of labour based on my cervix condition doc took a call to operate. The operation was successful and the doc was really fast in operating and post delivery she was there for daily routine checkups. Good experience.
